类 Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3_studentroster.Date
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
A date object class that stores, compares dates,and checks date validity.
作者:
Yuchen Wei, Denghao Sun

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Date

      public Date(String date)
      Constructor of a Date object that takes a string input of date in "mm/dd/yyyy" format and tokenize it into corresponding fields to construct an object.
      参数:
      date - a string input of date in "mm/dd/yyyy" format.

    • Date

      public Date()
      Non-parameter constructor of a Date object that creates an object with today鈥檚 date

  • 方法详细资料

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      A method that checks if the date object is valid and is after year 2021.
      返回:
      true if the date is valid, false otherwise.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      An override method that compare two dates.
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Date>
      参数:
      date - the date to be compared with.
      返回:
      true if two dates are the same, false otherwise.

    • binarySearch

      private int binarySearch(int[] monthArray, int key)
      A binary search method to find if the given month is in the array of big or small months.
      参数:
      monthArray - either big month array or small month array to be searched.
      key - the month number to be found in the array.
      返回:
      the index of key in the array if found, -1 if not found.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      An override method that generates the date info as a string.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      the string variable of a date in "mm/dd/yyyy".
